ApproxsimInt64_t Class Reference

ApproxsimInt64_t corresponds to the NonNegativeInteger type in the Approxsim xml schema. More...

Detailed Description

ApproxsimInt64_t corresponds to the NonNegativeInteger type in the Approxsim xml schema.
